title: Aasa Theera Aadikkalam Lyrics Balle Vellaiya Thevaa
stanzas:
Aasa Theera Aadikkalam Song Lyrics Balle Vellaiya Thevaa
#DarbukaSiva @dSathyaPrakash

hey thaatu poottu
thaalam idhu
thanjaavooru melam
vazhkaiyoda paalam
kalyanamthaan

poove edhuthu thoovum
oru peepi eduthu oodhum
ooru muzhukka kaetkum
kondaattamthaan

aasa theera aadikalaam
pottu nalla kacherithan
poga poga kathukalaam
vazhka enbadhu nambikathaan

aan manasu
ada oru padhinga
pen manasu adhu
marupaadhinga

naal muzhudhum
idha maravaadheenga
vaan mugila
ada kalaiyaatheenga

hey thaatu poottu
thaalam idhu
thanjaavooru melam
vazhkaiyoda paalam
kalyanamthaan

poove edhuthu thoovum
oru peepi eduthu oodhum
ooru muzhukka kaetkum
kondaattamthaan

Panjaangam thaan
thevavaiyila
anbodu anbaaga
sernthaale

panjaayanthaan
thevayilla
ullatha unmayaa
padichaale

aayiram kaalathu payira
oru paaramel neethaan
vidhaikkaatha

aayiram poisolli
ada daaa athan
aayula koraikkaathadaa

hey thaatu poottu
thaalam idhu
thanjaavooru melam
vazhkaiyoda paalam
kalyanamthaan

poove edhuthu thoovum
oru peepi eduthu oodhum
ooru muzhukka kaetkum
kondaattamthaan

yaarum inga aezha illa
ullaara sondhosam irundhaale
yaarum inga kolaiyilla
thannoda balamingu
unarndhaale

kanneeru vairathapola
adhu ulnenja pattaiya
theettidume

nambikka adhu onnu
podhu adhu un vazhva
maathidume.

aasa theera aadikalaam
pottu nalla kacherithan
poga poga kathukalaam
vazhka enbadhu nambikathaan

hey thaatu poottu
thaalam idhu
thanjaavooru melam
vazhkaiyoda paalam
kalyanamthaan

poove edhuthu thoovum
oru peepi eduthu oodhum
ooru muzhukka kaetkum
kondaattamthaan
